language.phrase: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable!
No Content found under this page !.

Are you sure you want to delete this record?
Stay tuned for news and updates
did not yield any results. Please try searching for similar terms.

Make sure you typed the correct URL or followed a valid link.

We use cookies to improve your experience on the website. Some cookies are required to ensure that the site functions correctly, for this reason we may have already set some cookies. Other cookies gather anonymous data about how you are using the website, however these will only be set if you give your consent.
In doing so you will be redirected. Do you wish to proceed?
Here you can view all your logs.
No logs found matching your criteria.
Here you can manage your custom fields. To reorder fields click and drag item reorder handle, position it where you want it. Position will be updated automatically.
Here you can update existing custom field.
Here you can add new custom field.
You don't have any custom fields yet...

The information displayed below is collected from a variety of locations, and summarized here so that you may be able to conveniently find some of the information required when trying to diagnose a problem or request help with your CMS pro installation.
Here you can make changes to your profile, upgrade membership, etc...
You have successfully updated your profile.
Please enter your valid username and password to login into your account.

Enter your username and email address below to reset your password. A verification token will be sent to your email address. Once you have received the token, you will be able to choose a new password for your account.
You have successfully changed your password. Please check your email for further info!
There was an error during the process. Please contact the administrator.
Please fill out the form below to become registered member.
Password must be at least 6 characters long.
We are sorry, at this point we do not accept any more registrations.
We are sorry, maximum number of registered users have been reached.
There was an error during registration process. Please contact the administrator...
You have successfully registered. Please check your email for further information!
Here you can activate your account. Please enter your email address and activation code received.
This account has been already activated!
The token code is not valid"
You have successfully activated your account!
Your account is now active. However you still need to wait for administrative approval.
There was an error during the activation process. Please contact the administrator.
You must be registered and logged in to access this page.
You must have valid membership to access this page.
Please upgrade your membership in order to access this page.
One of the following memberships are required:
Email could not be sent due to the following error(s):
Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully
Here you can perform backup and database restore.

Make sure your database is backed up frequently. Click on Create Backup to manually backup your database. The backups are stored in the [/admin/backups/] folder and can be downloaded from the list below. Your most recent backup is highlighted. Once you create backup, make sure you download it, and delete the rest.
You can enter your custom backup name. If left empty default name will be used instead
Are you sure you want to restore this backup?
This action can not be undone.
Sorry you don't have administrative privilege to access this page
Here you can update your system configuration.
The name of your web site, which is displayed in various locations across your site
This is your website slogan which will appear near your website heading
Directory where CMS pro is installed
Insert full URL WITHOUT any trailing slash (e.g. http://www.yourdomain.com)
This is the main email notices will be sent to. It is also used as the from 'email' when emailing other automatic emails
Some themes might contain additional options such as different color, layout etc...
Illegal file type. Only jpg and png file types allowed.
If no logo exists, Company Name will be used instead
Choose between two available WYSIWYG editors
You can upload different background image for your site, and overwrite default theme settings.
Whether or not to display login links.
Whether or not to display search box.
Whether or not to display navigation crumbs.
If Yes, language switcher will be available to front end users.
If Yes EU Cookie Law banner will be displayed for a user to accept/decline cookies
If site is inactive it will display Maintenance mode message. To access your site go to admin panel and login as admin Now only you'll be able to browse your site
Enter a message that will be displayed to your visitors, once the site is in offline mode.
Select the date/time when the site should be back online
Default number of items used for pagination
Locales are used for displaying dates in your own language format.
Default thumbnail Width/Height, used for resizing images.
Default avatar Width/Height, used for resizing images.
Default large image Width/Height, used for resizing images.
Enter your currency such as CAD, USD, EUR.
Enter your currency symbol such as $, €, £.
If Yes users will need to confirm their email address and go through activation process.
If Yes, once registration process is completed users will be able to login. If No Admin will need to manually activate each account.
Receive notification upon each new user registration.
Limit number of users that are allowed to register 0 = Unlimited..
Time to wait after the user or admin has failed (x) login attempts. Default: 30 Minutes(1800)sec. and 3 Login attempts
Whether or not to keep tracks of all user/system actions. Note, that large amount of data will be stored in database.
Use PHP Mailer or SMTP protocol for sending emails
Mail server port ( Can be 25, 26. 465 for GMAIL. 587 for Yahoo ). Ask your host if uncertain.
Choose Yes if your server requires SSL connection
Ask your hosting company for sandmail path if unsure. Usually: /usr/sbin/sendmail -t -i
Paste your code Google Analytics code here.
Meta keywords are used to describe your website. These are used by some search engines to categorise your website.
A meta description is a brief summary of the current page. It may be used by search engines when they display search results containing your website.
Here you can update your email template.
Here you can add new email template.
Below are your email templates. You can modify content of template(s) to suit your needs.
Your are missing all email templates. You need to reinstall them manually

Here you can create a new newsletter template and use it for later when needed. The following variables are acceptable: [NAME] / [URL] / [SITE_NAME], they will be replace with user fullname / default site url / default sitename.
Here you can update your CMS language.
Default Language Name, such as French, German etc...
This is your two letter country abbreviation code, such as fr, de es, etc... All lowercase
Here you can add new CMS Language.

To add French Language, enter Language Name: Français, Country Abbreviation: fr, Author: Your Website. Once done make a copy of /lang/en/ folder into /lang/fr/. Now you can start translating language phrases usin Language Manager built in editor, or you can open xml files directly into your text editor, and modify from there. Just make sure that xml files are saved in utf-8 formatn without BOM.
Here you can update your existing language phrases.

Below are all available languages. Note: Deleting language will also delete all database tables containing translations for deleted language. Please be patient as this process might take few seconds to complete.
Selected language file does not exist
Here you can perform site maintenance, such as deleting inactive and banned users, creating sitemap...

This will delete all users (not administrators), who have not logged in to the site within a certain time period. It will not delete users pending verification process. You specify the days spent inactive.
This will delete all ([NUMBER]) users pending verification process.
This will delete all ([NUMBER]) banned user(s).
Here you can create site map in xml format, that you can submit to your search engine for better ranking. We recommend you regularly update your sitemap.
There was an error creating sitemap.xml. Make sure filename [FILENAME] exists and is writable!!
Here you can send newsletter to newsletter subscribers, or email to individual users.
All Email(s) have been sent successfully!
Some of the emails could not be reached!
Here you can update your gateway settings.
When in live mode all transactions will be processed in real time
Only active gateways will be available for payment methods.
IPN Url might be needed for some gateways when recurring payments are involved.
Here you can manage your list of available gateways.
Your are missing all gateways. You need to reinstall them manually
Go to http://www.paypal.com/ to setup your PayPal account
Go to https://www.skrill.com/ to setup your Moneybookers/Skrill account
Enter your detailed instructions using /Instructions/ field for offline payment method
Please check your email for further instructions.
Here you can manage your CMS related files.
There was an error creating folder.
Be careful what you delete! Some files might be linked to certain pages, plugins, etc...
There was an error renaming file. Selected file does not exist.
There was an error creating file.
This file type is not allowed.
File with the same name already exists.
File is larger than the [LIMIT] limit.
This file type [EXT] is not allowed.
Directory with the same name already exists.
Here you can manage your cms page layout.
First select the page form dropdown list for which you want to manage layout. Home page is selected by default. If premium modules are install, additional dropdown list will be available.
There are four sections available in total, that you can use to assign your plugins to it. Top Section, Bottom Section, Left Section and Right Section. Each section can hold one or more plugins.
You can sort plugins and change their order, by dragging them around layout sections. You can move plugins from one section to another.
To insert a new plugin double click on any of the four sections. New window will open, and you can select one or more unused plugins.
To remove plugin)s) click on trash icon in Left/Right Section or Configuration icon in Top/Bottom Section and select remove

Top/Bottom section plugins could be spanned over uneven number of columns, rather than even ones. For example if you have 2 plugins assigned to Bottom Section, by default each plugin will take 100% of available space. Or you can manually assign maximum number of space taken for each plugin. For example First plugin could take 3 columns, second one 7 columns. The total must not exceed 10 columns. Or First plugin 3 columns, Second 5 columns and Third one 2 columns. You get the picture. You can mix and match any number of columns, just bare in mind that 10 is the magic number. Each time you add or remove a plugin, you will need to re-adjust the number of columns taken for each plugin.
Please enter valid username and password.
Login and/or password did not match to the database.
You need to verify your email address.
Too many login attempts. Please wait %MINUTES% minutes before next login attempt.
This is the control panel for your Tubi Portal installation. Here you can view important statistics such as visitors, total income, create todo notes etc...
Here you can view your latest visitor statistics.
Here you can update your menu items.
The name of the menu will appear in navigation
Caption or tag line accompanying current menu.
Parent menu can hold one or more submenus.
Choose from dropdown, or leave "Top Level" if this is Top-level menu.
You can create link to existing Content Page, Module or external link.
Enter full url starting with http://
Submenus could be divided into x number of columns for better visibility. This feature only works on parent menus
Menu Icon could be assign to your menu. Click on icon to select/deselect
If Yes it will be default homepage menu.
Use the form below to create a new menu (such as a navigation menu of web pages) which can then be displayed on your web site.

Drag and drop items to change their positions on the tree. Click on a menu or submenu name to access edit options. Click on icon to delete menu item. Click on Save Button to save menu positions. Note: Deleting parent menu will also delete all children assigned under the same parent
Here you can update your content plugin.
Sometimes you might want to hide plugin title, based on your plugin layout.
You can assign additional css classes for plugin styling.
Here you can add new content plugin.
Here you can manage your content plugin.
You don't have any plugin yet...
Here you can update your content module.
You can assign additional css classes for module styling.
Some Modules could have their own theme that is different from the rest of the site.
Here you can add new content module.
Here you can manage your content modules.
You don't have any module yet...
Here you can update your membership yazilim.
Membership Period must be numeric value
Period before membership expires. Valid values are: Day(s) Allowable range is 1 to 90 Week(s) Allowable range is 1 to 52 Month(s) Allowable range is 1 to 24 Year(s) Allowable range is 1 to 5
Trial Membership will be available for one time use only. You can only have one trial membership in total.
If Yes system will create recurring subscription.
Private memberships are not available to front end users.
Only active memberships will be available for purchase.
Here you can add new membership type.
Here you can manage your membership packages. Note: Make sure you are not deleting or deactivating memberships assigned to active users.
You don't have any membership packages yet...
Sorry, you have already used your trial membership!
Sorry there was an error activating your membership. Please contact the administrator!
Here you can view all your payment transactions.
You don't have any transactions yet...
Here you can view your sales report.
There are no sales for selected Year...
There are no sales for selected Month/Year...
Here you can update your content page.
Main Title of your current page
Caption or tag line accompanying current page.
Title appearing in browser navigation bar. If left empty will use Page Title instead.
There are no posts under this page!
This option allows you to add a contact form to your content page. The contact form will be placed after your content.
If Yes it willbe used as a default login page.
If Yes it willbe used as a default account activation page.
If Yes it willbe used as a default user account page.
If Yes it willbe used as a default sitemap page.
If Yes it willbe used as a default page to display search results.
If Yes it willbe used as a default registration page.
If Yes it willbe used as a default public user profile page.
If Yes, only super admin will be able to modify and view this page.
If Yes Comments will be available for this page. The comments will be placed after your content.
Please Select At Least One Membership Type.

Three different levels of page access are supported: Public, Registered and Membership. Public Access will allow anyone to view this page, while Registered Access will be available only to registered and logged in users. Membership Access will require user to have valid membership.
You can select one or more membership types, that would be required in order for user to access this page.
From dropdown list select one of the Page Modules, to assign to current page. Some modules such as Gallery Module will have additional selectable options.
You can assign bacground static image to your page. Make sure image is large enough to stretch accros screen.
Each page can have it's own theme assigned, thus giving completely unique look and feel to your page.
if left empty, will be generated automatically, based on your content assigned to this page. You can enter your own meta keywords separated by coma.
if left empty, will be generated automatically, based on your content assigned to this page. You can enter your own meta description.
Here you can add new content page
Here you can manage your content pages. Note: Deleting page will also delete layouts under the same page.
If selected, this will be your default home (index) page.
Add additional JavaScript code including JavaScript tags
You don't have any pages yet...
Here you can update your user's info.
Leave it empty unless changing it.
Entered Email Address Is Already In Use.
Entered Email Address Is Not Valid.
Entered Email Address Does Not Exists.
You can manually assign membership to current user, without the need of payment.
Super Admin has full rights. Admin has assignable permissions. User it's just registered user.

Select which components administrator will be able to access. Only applies to Regular Administrators. Super Admin will have full access. In order to grant access to individual Plugins/Modules you will also need to grant access to Plugins/Modules section as well.

Four different User Statuses are available: Active User - will be able to login and perform actions allowed to Registered Users. Inactive User - will not be able to login, unless Administrator approves user account. Banned User - upon login will receive an error message letting user know, that their account is currently banned. Pending User - will not be able to login until email verification process is completed.
Send welcome email to this user.
User Notes field is used for internal purposes only. You can store any user related information here.
Here you can add new user
We are sorry, selected username does not exist in our database
Username Is Too Short (less Than 4 Characters Long).
Sorry, This Username Is Already Taken
Password is too short (less than 6 characters long)
Your password did not match the confirmed password!.
Here you can manage your users. You can email each user by clicking on username.
